sources: File with all sources used in the text.
last_update: Time in Unix Epoch showing last file update.
authors: Name of people that edited text.
reviewers: Name of people that review the text.

content.id: An ID for the current section.
desc: Additional description for text shown on screen.
content.jumpTo: ID of the section I can jump
content.answer: A value defining the answer to be selected.
content.score: A numeric value to be given when reader reaches the goal. We strongly suggest to give at least one point for reader, because life is a learning process.

levels.name: Name to be displayed on screen
levels.desc: A description of the Top level

levels.name: Name to be displayed on screen
